info.name: Site Management API
info.description: The Site Management API enables brX developers to manage channel configurations through a set of endpoints for operations on channels, layouts, component groups, routes, and menus

item.name: Get meta-data for a channel parameter

variable.description: (Required) Channel id. Optionally includes the project id, separated by a dash: mychannel-branchId
(Required) Name of the parameter

response.name: OK

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

variable.description: (Required) Channel id. Optionally includes the project id, separated by a dash: mychannel-branchId
(Required) Name of the parameter

header.description: Resource's version. Must be used in any subsequent update requests of this resource

response.body:
{
  "name": "smAccountId",
  "valueType": "string",
  "required": true,
  "hidden": false,
  "overlay": false,
  "defaultValue": "",
  "displayName": "brSM Account ID",
  "system": false,
  "config": null
}

response.name: OK

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

variable.description: (Required) Channel id. Optionally includes the project id, separated by a dash: mychannel-branchId

header.description: Resource's version. Must be used in any subsequent update requests of this resource

response.body:
{
  "id": "brxsaas-vIUy9",
  "name": "BrX SaaS",
  "branch": "vIUy9",
  "branchOf": "brxsaas",
  "contentRootPath": "/content/documents/brxsaas",
  "locale": null,
  "devices": [],
  "defaultDevice": null,
  "responseHeaders": null,
  "linkurlPrefix": null,
  "cdnHost": null,
  "parameters": {
    "graphql_baseurl": "${public.brx.graphql.baseurl}",
    "smDomainKey": "",
    "smAccountId": "${public.brx.smAccountId}",
    "smEndpoint": "${public.brx.smEndpoint}",
    "spaUrl": "https://brxm-react-spa.herokuapp.com/"
  }
}

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

variable.description: (Required) Channel id. Optionally includes the project id, separated by a dash: mychannel-branchId

request.description:
Get all the channel developer branches in the brXM instance.
If the returned list is empty, it means that there are no developer projects linked to any channel. It may be necessary to create a developer project or to link an existing developer project to a channel

response.name: OK

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

item.name: Get a component within a component group

variable.description: (Required) Channel id. Optionally includes the project id, separated by a dash: mychannel-branchId
(Required) Name of group
(Required) Name of component

response.name: OK

header.description: Added as a part of security scheme: apikey

variable.description: (Required) Channel id. Optionally includes the project id, separated by a dash: mychannel-branchId
(Required) Name of group
(Required) Name of component

header.description: Resource's version. Must be used in any subsequent update requests of this resource

response.body:
{
  "id": "sample-group/video",
  "extends": "base/component",
  "hidden": false,
  "system": false,
  "xtype": null,
  "ctype": "Video",
  "contentType": "brxsaas:titleandtext",
  "label": "Video",
  "icon": "data:image/svg+xml;base64,",
  "parameters": [
    {
      "name": "url",
      "valueType": "string",
      "required": true,
      "hidden": false,
      "overlay": false,
      "defaultValue": "",
      "displayName": null,
      "system": false,
      "config": null
    }
  ],
  "fieldGroups": [
    {
      "name": "param-group-key",
      "displayName": "Param group key",
      "parameters": [
        "url"
      ]
    }
  ]
}
